availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Abraham P. Gorsuch (Jefferson County, Kentucky, steamboat engineer and printer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, steamboat engineer and printer. Maryland native. Married to Eleanor Gorsuch. Father of James G. Gorsuch and Elizabeth Gorsuch. Worked in water navigation in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1840. Steamboat engineer in Jefferson County in 1850. Steamboat engineer in Jefferson County in 1860. Printer with James G. Gorsuch as Gorsuch & Co. in Louisville in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 7.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 2, p. 226A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 8, p. 585.
